tool_description: Adult content detection technology identifies explicit content in images that are not safe for work or other public places.  Our AI model detects exposed parts of a body and classifies if they are considered NSFW content.
name: NSFW images detection and classification
title: NSFW images detection and classification

api_list.name: NSFW content classification from image (url)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nsfw-images-detection-and-classification.p.rapidapi.com/adult-content"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nsfw-images-detection-and-classification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nsfw-images-detection-and-classification.p.rapidapi.com/adult-content"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nsfw-images-detection-and-classification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
